Class GameplayInputProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • itcom.gangstersquirrel.Input.GameplayInputProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor

    public class GameplayInputProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
    Handles most gameplay related input for the PlayScreen class
